nodes.description: 2004年马德里通勤高峰时段发生火车爆炸案，造成191人死亡。
nodes.support_text: ...the rush-hour bombings that killed 191 people and left more than 1,800 wounded...

nodes.description: 西班牙当局最初将爆炸案归咎于巴斯克分离主义分子。
nodes.support_text: Spanish authorities initially blamed the blasts on Basque separatists, despite evidence of Islamic radical involvement.

nodes.description: 袭击发生三天后，现任社会主义政府当选上台。
nodes.support_text: ...the current Socialist government was voted into power three days after the attack.

nodes.description: 新政府迅速将西班牙军队从伊拉克撤回。
nodes.support_text: The new leaders quickly brought Spain's troops home from Iraq.

nodes.description: 被告拉贝·奥斯曼于2004年6月在意大利被捕。
nodes.support_text: Osman, who is accused of being one of three men who masterminded the attack, was arrested in Italy in June 2004.

nodes.description: 一项长期调查得出结论，袭击是由一个本土伊斯兰极端主义小组实施的。
nodes.support_text: The trial marks the culmination of a lengthy probe which concluded the attack was carried out by a homegrown cell of Muslim extremists angry about the then-conservative Spanish government's support for the Iraq war.

nodes.description: 针对29名被告的审判在高度戒备下开始。
nodes.support_text: ...the trial of 29 defendants began Thursday with emotions running extremely high in a country still coming to grips with the attack.

nodes.description: 第一名被告拉贝·奥斯曼在法庭上否认与袭击有任何关联。
nodes.support_text: "I never had any relation to the events which occurred in Madrid," he said in Arabic through a translator, adding that he condemned the bombings "unconditionally and completely."

nodes.description: 预计审判将持续五个多月，并于十月下旬做出判决。
nodes.support_text: Testimony is expected to last more than five months and a verdict is expected in late October.

nodes.description: 在庭审现场，许多嫌疑人坐在防弹玻璃后，避免或转过身去不看受害者的亲属，情绪紧张。
nodes.support_text: Many of the suspects sat behind bulletproof glass and avoided looking at the victims' relatives. Some turned their backs.

nodes.description: 一些亲属和幸存者表示难以忍受与被告同处一室，并选择通过闭路电视在另一房间观看庭审。
nodes.support_text: Some relatives and survivors said they could barely bring themselves to be in the same room as the defendants and chose to watch the proceedings on closed-circuit TV in a separate room.

nodes.description: 一个心理学家小组在庭审后为悲伤的亲属和幸存者提供心理援助。
nodes.support_text: A team of psychologists was on hand to assist grieving relatives and survivors after the session.

nodes.description: Osman在监听通话中据称吹嘘自己是袭击的幕后主使。
nodes.support_text: Osman is believed to have boasted in a tapped phone conversation that he was the brains behind it.

nodes.description: 意大利检察官监听了Osman的电话通话。
nodes.support_text: Italian prosecutors have said they tapped phone conversations involving Osman.

nodes.description: Osman告诉一名同伙，他是通往马德里的线索，这是他的杰作。
nodes.support_text: In one conversation, he told an associate that he was 'the thread to Madrid' and 'my masterpiece.'

nodes.description: 意大利检察官曾表示他们监听了Osman的电话通话。
nodes.support_text: Italian prosecutors have said they tapped phone conversations involving Osman.

nodes.description: Rabei Osman拒绝回答检察官的任何问题。
nodes.support_text: The first defendant to testify, Rabei Osman, refused to answer any questions from prosecutors.

nodes.description: Os曼否认是基地组织或任何其他伊斯兰极端组织的成员。
nodes.support_text: Osman also denied being a member of al-Qaida or any other Islamic extremist group.

nodes.description: Os曼说他只在清真寺认识其他据称是爆炸案成员的人，仅限于熟人关系。
nodes.support_text: He said he knew other alleged members of the bombing cell only as acquaintances from a mosque.

nodes.description: 西班牙在1930年代发生内战。
nodes.support_text: 该动词事件描述的背景信息

nodes.description: 西班牙电视台全天重播了尸体袋和扭曲火车车厢的画面。
nodes.support_text: 该动词事件描述的背景信息

nodes.description: 西班牙人认为（该回忆所指向的事件）是国家自1930年代内战以来最创伤的事件。
nodes.support_text: 该动词事件描述的背景信息

nodes.description: 法庭传唤约100名专家和600名证人作证。
nodes.support_text: The trial is expected to call some 100 experts and 600 witnesses.

nodes.description: 因恐怖主义定罪的人开始服刑。
nodes.support_text: Anyone convicted on a terrorism charge would have to serve the time.

nodes.description: 该小组受到了基地组织的启发。
nodes.support_text: 该小组受到了基地组织的启发。

nodes.description: 该小组没有收到来自奥萨马·本·拉登恐怖组织的资助。
nodes.support_text: 该小组没有收到来自奥萨马·本·拉登恐怖组织的资助。

nodes.description: 当局的指责行为导致了对其掩盖真相的指控。
nodes.support_text: This led to charges of a cover-up.

edges.support_text: Spanish authorities initially blamed the blasts on Basque separatists, despite evidence of Islamic radical involvement.
...the current Socialist government was voted into power three days after the attack.
Osman, who is accused of being one of three men who masterminded the attack, was arrested in Italy in June 2004.
爆炸案发生后，电视台开始重播相关画面。
The trial marks the culmination of a lengthy probe which concluded the attack was carried out by a homegrown cell of Muslim extremists...
当局的指责行为先于并导致了掩盖真相的指控。
The new leaders quickly brought Spain's troops home from Iraq.
Nearly three years after the rush-hour bombings that killed 191 people and left more than 1,800 wounded, the trial of 29 defendants began Thursday...
Osman was arrested in June 2004; the tapped conversations are part of the evidence leading to the trial.
The trial marks the culmination of a lengthy probe which concluded the attack was carried out by a homegrown cell of Muslim extremists...
The first defendant to testify, Rabei Osman, refused to answer any questions from prosecutors.
Testimony is expected to last more than five months and a verdict is expected in late October.
The trial of 29 defendants began... Many of the suspects sat behind bulletproof glass...
The trial of 29 defendants began... Some relatives and survivors said they could barely bring themselves to be in the same room...
The trial began, and the first defendant, Osman, refused to answer questions.
审判开始后，进入传唤证人作证的阶段。
判决做出后，定罪的人才开始服刑。
Many of the suspects sat behind bulletproof glass... A team of psychologists was on hand to assist grieving relatives and survivors after the session.
Some relatives and survivors said they could barely bring themselves to be in the same room... A team of psychologists was on hand to assist grieving relatives and survivors after the session.
The boasting occurred during the tapped phone conversations.
The conversation where he told an associate was part of the tapped communications.
Prosecutors' statements about the tapped calls were made before the trial began.
After refusing to answer questions, Osman made a statement denying involvement in the attack.
As part of his testimony, after refusing questions, he also denied extremist group membership.
He also explained his relationship with other alleged members after refusing to answer questions.
1930年代的内战早于2004年的火车爆炸案。
内战是公众评价事件创伤程度的历史参照。
媒体的重播影响了公众对该事件的看法和认知。
证人作证是审判过程中的一个环节，之后会做出判决。
根据temporal_order，事件1(inspire)发生在事件2(receive)之前。
根据temporal_order，事件2(receive)发生在事件5(say)之前，而事件5由node_6体现。
